cv.meta.title: CV
cv.meta.description: Personal portfolio with profile summary, skills and curriculum.
cv.hero.eyebrow: Tadeo Amigorena — IT Solutions Designer & Developer
cv.hero.title: Building tooling, simulation and playful interactive software.
cv.hero.intro: I design and develop technical solutions across surgical robotics tooling, VR digital twins and game prototypes. Recent work includes a production Python/Qt app for Maestro robot configuration and a real-time Unreal Engine digital twin replaying telemetry. I enjoy graphics, low-level optimization and creative experiments from games.

cv.exp.moonVr.title: Intern — Moon Surgical (VR Digital Twin)
cv.exp.moonVr.item1: Built Unreal Engine VR digital twin replaying Maestro telemetry, transforms & animations.
cv.exp.moonVr.item2: Developed OR levels and POV tools to explore camera improvements for future versions.
cv.exp.moonTooling.title: Intern — Moon Surgical (Sledgehammer Tooling)
cv.exp.moonTooling.item1: Created "Sledgehammer" Python & Qt application for manufacturing team: log management, configuration & software installation.
cv.exp.moonTooling.item2: Used in production and on field to configure & debug Maestro laparoscopic robot.
